channel.title: Forwarding-Engine on Prasenjit Manna
channel.description: Recent content in Forwarding-Engine on Prasenjit Manna

item.title: Longest Prefix Matching(LPM)
item.description: Longest Prefix Matching (LPM) In general, LPM (Longest prefix match) is an important know how in routing. There are topic like TCAM, Trie, Multibit trie, Compressed Trie/Patricia Tie, Bloom Filter, Hash Table, etc, are considered in routing lookup. These are few articles created the gist for it. Longest Prefix Matching in Networking Chips by Sharada Yeluri Hashing Strategies for Packet Processing by Diptanshu Singh Join my email list to get direct access to new blog posts.

item.title: Router Forwarding Engines Series by Russ White
item.description: Router Forwarding Engines Series by Russ White A Close Look at Router Forwarding Engines: Part 1 – What are the Problems? Router Forwarding Engines: Part 2 – OpenFlow and I2RS as Possible Solutions Router Forwarding Engines: Part 3 – P4 and SAI Routing Forwarding Engines: Part 4 – Discarding, Punting, and DPDK Router Forwarding Engines: Part 5 – eBPF Join my email list to get direct access to new blog posts.
